items.title: Tracking Al Gore's Generation Investment Management Portfolio - Q4 2024 Update
items.description: Generation Investment Management reduces portfolio value to $19.17B, adds stakes in GOOG & TTAN, boosts Schwab, MercadoLibre, cuts Amazon & Trimble.

items.title: Columbia Large Cap Growth Fund Q4 2024 Commentary
items.description: Columbia Large Cap Growth Fund Institutional Share Class Shares returned 5.71% for Q4 2024. Click here to read the full commentary.

items.title: Afraid Of Investing In Individual Stocks? Consider This ETF Trifecta
items.description: I have been recently adding ETFs as these are also great for building wealth. Check out the ETF trifecta you should consider for your portfolio and why.
